question: In which nation Kahuzi-Biega National Park is located?
explanation: Kahuzi-Biega National Park is located in the eastern side of the Democratic Republic of Congo. It lies adjacent to Lake Kivu near the Rwandan border. This park house two dormant volcanoes such as Mount Kahuzi and Mount Biega. It is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. It is one of the last habitats of the rare endangered species of the Eastern Lowland Gorilla. It has a unique habitat of rainforest and riparian forests.
